description: Detects suspicious .NET assembly executions. Could detect using Cobalt Strike's command execute-assembly. Author: omkar72, oscd.community, Wojciech Lesicki. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: https://twitter.com/SBousseaden/status/1388064061087260675 - rundll32.exe with zzzzInvokeManagedCustomActionOutOfProc in command line and msiexec.exe as parent process
name: Suspcious CLR Logs Creation
query: (file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\CLR* AND file.path:*\\UsageLogs\\* AND file.path:(*mshta* OR *cscript* OR *wscript* OR *regsvr32* OR *wmic* OR *rundll32* OR *svchost*))
